text: The Benson & Hedges Trophy was a professional golf tournament that was held in Spain from 1988 to 1991. It was a mixed pairs event that was an unofficial money event on both the European Tour and Ladies European Tour. The tournament was held in November, after the conclusion of the main Order of Merit schedule, at a different venue each year. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" |- !Year!!Venue!!Winner!!Score!!Margin of victory!!Runner(s)-up!!Ref |- | 1991 || Las Brisas GC || Anders Forsbrand & Helen Alfredsson || 275 (−13) || 2 strokes || Malcolm Mackenzie & Penny Grice-Whittaker Bryan Norton & Pearl Sinn || |- | 1990 || El Bosque G&CC; || José María Cañizares & Tania Abitbol || 267 (−21) || 2 strokes || Mark Mouland & Alison Nicholas || |- | 1989 || Aloha GC || Miguel Ángel Jiménez & Xonia Wunsch-Ruiz || 281 (−7) || 2 strokes || Carl Mason & Gillian Stewart || |- | 1988 || La Moraleja || Mark McNulty & Marie-Laure de Lorenzi-Taya || 276 (−12) || 1 stroke || José María Cañizares & Tania Abitbol || |} ==References== Category:Former European Tour events Category:Former Ladies European Tour events Category:Golf tournaments in Spain Category:Team golf tournaments Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1988 Category:Recurring sporting events disestablished in 1991
title: Benson & Hedges Trophy
